channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: aespa On Their “Dirty Work” Come Back, KCON Performance & More | KCON LA 2025
item.description: 🎉 aespa is bringing the 🔥 to KCON LA 2025 with new music! Get ready to dance 💃 #aespa #KCONLA2025 🎶

item.title: Matt Rife Becomes “Legal Guardian” of Annabelle Doll
item.description: 👻 Matt Rife takes spooky to the next level by becoming the "legal guardian" of Annabelle Doll! Would you dare? 🎃 #horror #musicnews

item.title: Jelly Roll Brings Grit & Heart to In-Ring Debut at WWE SummerSlam 2025
item.description: 🥊🎶 Jelly Roll makes an electrifying entrance at WWE SummerSlam with his signature grit and heart! Who else caught this epic moment? 🔥 #JellyRoll #WWE #SummerSlam

item.title: Jerry Garcia Has Childhood Street Named for Him in San Francisco
item.description: 🎸 Rock on, Jerry! San Francisco honors the legendary Jerry Garcia with his own childhood street name! 🌟 #JerryGarcia #GratefulDead #SanFrancisco

item.title: Sam Ryder announces new album ‘Heartland’ and shares single ‘The Feeling Never Went Away’
item.description: 🎶 Sam Ryder is back with the feels! ‘Heartland’ album coming soon 💖🎸 #TheFeelingNeverWentAway #NewMusicAlert
